name: Pawns (modrako)
description:
A free and fun spin on the classic game of chess

Play locally or through a voice call with your friends and pick one from 8 unique characters for you to choose, use their special ability to beat your opponent!

  • Local multiplayer 
  • 8 characters
  • Fun Style
  • Android Support
  • Playable even on low end devices

Made for and worked on partially by a friend 

My first game ever published and finished in unity 

Have fun

-- game is fullscreen --
